title: Implement CLI Argument Parsing
description: Port CLI from CLASSIC_ScanLogs.py. Should support --fcx-mode, --show-fid-values, --stat-logging, --move-unsolved, --ini-path, --scan-path, --mods-folder-path, --simplify-logs flags.

title: Implement CLI Scan Execution
description: Create CLI entry point that orchestrates scans from command line, outputs progress to console, generates reports without GUI.

title: Implement BA2 Archive Scanner
description: Port BA2 archive parsing and content validation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/core/ba2_scanner.py. Should parse BA2 headers, enumerate contents, validate compression, and detect issues.
close_reason: Implemented BA2 Archive Scanner with header validation, file discovery, and comprehensive unit tests (21 tests)

title: Implement DDS Texture Analyzer
description: Port DDS texture analysis from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/core/dds_processor.py. Should parse DDS headers, validate texture formats, check mipmaps, verify resolution, detect compression issues.
close_reason: Implemented DDS Texture Analyzer with header parsing, validation, BSArch integration for archive analysis, and 28 unit tests

title: Implement Documents Path Management
description: Port documents path detection from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/DocsPath.py. Should detect user documents folder, Windows registry lookups, custom path configuration.
close_reason: Implemented DocsPathDetector with detection via Windows Registry Shell Folders and Environment.SpecialFolder fallback. Added OneDrive detection (IsOneDrivePath property), path generation for INI/XSE/log files, and 47 unit tests.

title: Implement Game Path Detection
description: Port game path detection from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/GamePath.py. Should detect game installations via registry, XSE log parsing, platform-specific resolution, VR game detection.
close_reason: Implemented GamePathDetector with registry lookup and XSE log parsing. Added GameType enum, GamePathResult model, IGamePathDetector interface. Full test coverage with 93 GamePath-specific tests.

title: Implement Mod Detection (Single/Double Mods)
description: Port mod detection from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanLog/DetectMods.py. Should detect single mods from direct matches, double mod conflicts, important mod evaluation, generate mod-related warnings.
close_reason: Implemented ModDetector with single mod detection, double mod conflicts, important mods checking. Added IModDetector interface, ModDetectionResult model, ModConfiguration model, and ConfigurationCache integration. 17 unit tests passing. LogOrchestrator integration can be done separately.

title: Implement GPU Detection and Compatibility
description: Port GPU detection from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanLog/GPUDetector.py. Should extract GPU info from system specs, identify manufacturer (AMD/Nvidia), detect rival GPUs, check compatibility.

title: Implement TOML Config Validator
description: Port TOML validation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/core/toml_checker.py. Should validate crash generator TOML configs, check versions, detect configuration issues.
close_reason: Implemented TOML Config Validator with full test coverage

title: Implement Log Collection/Moving
description: Port log collection from CLASSIC_ScanLogs.py. Should support moving/copying logs based on analysis results (solved vs unsolved), organizing logs into directories.

title: Implement ScanGame Report Generator
description: Port ScanGame report generation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/core/report_builder.py. Should compose reports from all ScanGame findings with proper formatting.
close_reason: Implemented ScanGameReportBuilder with ScanGameSections static generators, IScanGameReportBuilder interface, and 41 unit tests

title: Implement INI File Validator
description: Port INI validation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/ScanModInis.py. Should parse INI sections, validate values, detect conflicts between different INI files.
close_reason: Implemented INI File Validator with parser, cache, validator, models, and 55 tests

title: Implement Update Checking
description: Port update checking from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/Update.py. Should fetch GitHub releases, compare versions, show update notifications, display release notes.

title: Implement Game Integrity Checker
description: Port game integrity checking from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/GameIntegrity.py. Should detect critical game files, check for modifications, support backup creation.
close_reason: Implemented GameIntegrityChecker with executable hash validation, Program Files detection, Steam INI detection, and 40 unit tests

title: Implement Path Validation
description: Port path validation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/PathValidator.py. Should validate paths, apply restriction checks for custom scans, verify path existence, handle symbolic links.
close_reason: Implemented PathValidator service with full settings validation support

title: Implement Pastebin Integration
description: Port Pastebin integration from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/Interface/Pastebin.py. Should support report sharing to Pastebin, link generation, clipboard integration.

title: Implement FCX Mode Handler
description: Port FCX mode from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanLog/FCXModeHandler.py. READ-ONLY mode that detects INI configuration issues, reports current vs recommended values, classifies issue severity.

title: Path Management and Game Detection
close_reason: All child tasks complete: GamePathDetector, DocsPathDetector, and PathValidator implemented with full test coverage

title: Implement Papyrus Monitoring
description: Port Papyrus monitoring from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/Interface/Papyrus.py. Real-time Papyrus log monitoring, log display, error detection, log saving.

title: Implement XSE Plugin Checker
description: Port XSE validation from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/XseCheck.py. Should verify script extender installation, check Address Library, detect log errors, validate configurations.
close_reason: Implemented XSE Plugin Checker with full integrity validation including Address Library check, XSE version detection, log error scanning, and script hash verification

title: Implement Record Scanner
description: Port record scanning from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/RecordScanner.py. Should scan for problematic game records in call stacks, batch record processing.

title: ScanGame Module Implementation
close_reason: Implemented ScanGameOrchestrator with IScanGameOrchestrator interface, ScanGameConfiguration, ScanGameResult, ScanGameProgress models, DI registration, and 22 unit tests (all passing)

title: Implement Advanced Settings Dialog
description: Port advanced settings from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/Interface/Settings. Tabbed settings interface with path configuration, scan options, display preferences.

title: Implement Unpacked Mods Scanner
description: Port unpacked mod scanning from Code_To_Port/ClassicLib/ScanGame/core/unpacked_scanner.py. Should scan directories for loose files, validate mod structure, detect overwritten vanilla files.
close_reason: Implemented UnpackedModsScanner with models, interface, service, and 41 unit tests
